title: The Unholy Grave
description: Since dying over ten years ago, Lincoln is returning to his homeland, Abonerra. With the ring lost to their enemy, he must protect the chain at all costs.El is in mourning. She made herself one promise over 10 years ago... protect AJ with her life. She failed. Now she must return to her family home for the first time since her parent’s death so AJ can receive his final rights as he journeys to the Afterlands.Ben is in prison, and that’s exactly where he deserves to be. His actions led to AJ’s death and his father obtaining Gedeon’s lost ring. With Monty fighting for his freedom, Ben needs to battle his own inner demons to find justice for AJ.
author: Johnathon Nicolaou
